messages.speech:
There are two types of testing done for
corona currently:
Antigen testing: A protein on the surface
of the virus called a spike protein can be
tested by amplifying it in the lab using a
method called rt-PCR. This is a slower
method of testing and takes about 24
hours for results.
Antibody testing: A test is available which
detects the presence of antibodies
produced by the immune cells of our body
towards the virus. This is a more rapid
form of testing. Results can be made
available in a time frame varying from a
few minutes to a few hours.
